scripts.build: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run build
scripts.build:analyze: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run build:analyze
scripts.dev: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run dev
scripts.start: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run start
scripts.lint: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run lint:fix
scripts.clean:hard: npx rimraf ./**/node_modules && npx rimraf ./**/lib && rm package-lock.json && npx rimraf ./**/.turbo && npx rimraf ./**/.nuxt
scripts.test: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test
scripts.test:watch: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test:watch
scripts.test:coverage: npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && npx turbo run test:coverage
scripts.test:cypress-editor: concurrently -k -s=first "npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test:cypress-editor" "npm run start"
scripts.test:cypress-quarantine: concurrently -k -s=first "npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test:cypress-quarantine" "npm run start"
scripts.test:cypress: concurrently -k -s=first "npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test:cypress" "npm run start"
scripts.test:cypress-dev: concurrently -k -s=first "npx wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && npm run turbo:disable-telemetry && turbo run test:cypress-dev" "npm run start"
